comments:
I am getting a null-pointer exception when trying to create the generator model for my simple example application. All input files validate fine, but generation then crashes:

!ENTRY org.eclipse.core.jobs 4 2 2006-10-27 10:06:04.804
!MESSAGE An internal error occurred during: "Create generator model...".
!STACK 0
java.lang.NullPointerException
	at org.eclipse.gmf.internal.bridge.genmodel.navigator.NavigatorHandler.getAssignableGenNodes(NavigatorHandler.java:128)
	at org.eclipse.gmf.internal.bridge.genmodel.navigator.NavigatorHandler.getTargetGenNodes(NavigatorHandler.java:116)
	at org.eclipse.gmf.internal.bridge.genmodel.navigator.NavigatorHandler.process(NavigatorHandler.java:84)
	at org.eclipse.gmf.internal.bridge.genmodel.DiagramGenModelTransformer.process(DiagramGenModelTransformer.java:528)
	at org.eclipse.gmf.internal.bridge.genmodel.MappingTransformer.transform(MappingTransformer.java:35)
	at org.eclipse.gmf.internal.codegen.popup.actions.TransformToGenModel$2.process(TransformToGenModel.java:272)
	at org.eclipse.gmf.internal.codegen.popup.actions.TransformToGenModel$1.run(TransformToGenModel.java:189)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.Worker.run(Worker.java:58)
